page.title: 03OUR RECCTOR
page.content: Father Michael is the Rector. He likes early morning communion services best. God and the church made Father Michael become a vicar.At 5.30am he gets up, does his diary work and his files. 6.30am goes to church for communion. 7.00am home for breakfast and paper. 9.30am Mawgan School assembly 11.30- 1.00 home visits and home communions. 2.30-5.00 visit sick. 5.00 to church for evening prayer. 5.30 tea. 7.10 evening meetings. Every Tuesday he tries to get a day off. Father Michael likes working with people and sharing their joys and sorrows. He enjoys mixing with his congregation of village people,RAF, young famililes, and those who have come to retire. For Father Michael the church is the centre of the village and gives a warm welcome to everyone.
